overview: Film tells about one day the King went to all the people of the jungle clearing . In the middle of the jungle there was a very thick clump sewers .  The army was clearing sewer , but when it cleared sewer regenerate. People tried to slash it again sewer but still the situation is still the same .  When the king saw this, he himself tried to cut down the sewer , the sewer successfully cleared out all arrive until the middle of the sewers .
title: Anak Buloh Betong
